author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Dr Nauman Niaz must apologize to our legend @shoaib100mph . We request the Pakistani government and PTV administration to remove him from his post in PTV . He will also be reduced to just his youtube channel which will also  not get enough audience . This is our duty as a nation.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: From 2000 to 2021 , I was a supporter of New Zealand Cricket because of their cricket sprit , love for the game and sportsmanship but yesterday they lost all my respect . They didn't only insulted PCB but whole Pakistani Nation.Just for nothing  🙏🙏@PCB @iramizraja

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Banning TLP in Pakistan is the need of whole country . These kind of events  are a reason behind Pakistan being in grey list of FATF. Why some people or organizations are stronger than the state itself ? #BANTLPINPAKISTAN

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Very saddened to hear about the death of 59 years old former Australian Cricketer Dean Jones . He was a wonderful human being . Always supported youngsters in PSL and was a great embassador of the game . May your soul rest in peace Deano 😭

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: In last 6 Cricket tournaments held in England from 1999 to 2019 . Pakistan Cricket team has played in finals 3 times , 2 times winners , 1 time runner-up and 1 time semifinals .  The best record by an outside belongs to Pakistan in this case .💯💓 @TheRealPCBMedia

text: Corrupt Nawaz Sharif completed Lowari Tunnel and in Naya Pakistan  Chitral is not included in the Chakdara motorway project . Thank you so much tabdeeli agayi hai.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: I had complained about the poor internet in Chitral two months ago frequently by tweets and complain to mobile network companies . Now it's the Twitter trend in Chitral KPK Pakistan. #internetforchitral . We need internet 💓🇵🇰💯

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: India for sure is going to highlight this statement in the world and UN . Things are not going to be easy as we are in grey list by FATF and our chances to survive from being blacklisted is on . If happens we can't take funds from other countries 💯🇵🇰

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Some people are so surprised by Imran Khan calling Osama Bin Laden a ( shaheed ) bro he has never supported Pakistan participation in Afghan war that is what he has again said in National Assembly . No slip of tongue.💯🇵🇰

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: We are complaining for the poor internet service provided by @jazzpk in the whole Chitral district and Drosh Tehsil by last one month but no improvement . People are facing a lot of problems due to the slow service. Anybody listening?

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Heartfelt condolences, thoughts and prayers with the families and loved ones of those poor souls who have lost their lives on PK8303. Stay strong Pakistan.🇵🇰🇵🇰 #PIACrash #karachicrash #karachiPlaneCrash

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Sometimes walking away has nothing to do with weakness, and everything to do with strength. We walk away not because we want others to realize our worth and value, but because we finally realize our own.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Every struggle in your life has shaped you into the person you are today. Be thankful for the hard times, they can only make you stronger...

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Stop chasing after people and being the only one trying to fix everything. It’s mentally and physically exhausting. Accept whoever comes and goes from your life and find peace. Don’t be the only one putting in effort because you'll only lose yourself trying to save someone else.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: You've been silently winning battles and transforming yourself this year. Be proud of every step you've made in the right direction. You deserve nothing but the best and your time is coming. Keep going and get better each and every day.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Not everyone will appreciate what you do for them. You have to figure out who's worth your kindness and who's just taking advantage of you.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Turn problems into opportunities. Instead of being stuck on what happened, change your mindset and attitude to find solutions. Tell yourself that it’s going to get better. Once you decide that you won’t be negative or pessimistic, answers show up. Trust the process. Keep smiling.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Everyone you meet is fighting a battle you know nothing about. Be kind. Always.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Secretary General of United Nations: Help Preserve Kalash a tribe in Pakistan for United Nations Protected site- - Sign the Petition! https://t.co/CX6Zaoj6yi via @Change

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Work at being calm about everything, it will allow your mind to find solutions. Calmness is also a state of trust. Instead of overthinking and overreacting, you just surrender for that moment and allow yourself to receive guidance for what doesn’t make sense....

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Oh my dear Chitrali's please don't abuse anyone on social media for the old Fokker plane . Both Siraj Ul Mulk sir and DC Chitral @MahsudKhurshid  are very respectable for us . This issue will be solved soon whatever it is but the words u will speak or write are going to matter .

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: What’s meant for you will happen for you in a way that you could never expect or explain. Nothing can get in the way of it and how it will enter your life. Just be in a constant state of gratitude and focus your mindset on your vision. Believe in it. It’s all happening for you...

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Things can suddenly change for the better. Don’t ever doubt the power of an instant miracle and a unexpected breakthrough. You can’t be stuck for too long. Start owning this positive mindset and watch how quickly your life begins to change.

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Pakistan Army Zindabad. Fake surgical strikes by India and now be ready for our surprise.💪👌✌👏

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Your kindness is not a weakness, it's an absolute strength. Never let anyone make you think otherwise...

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: I’m not going to rush anything, not going to stress out or worry about how things will work out for me. Instead of overthinking, I will align my faith with divine timing and trust that everything that belongs in my life is making its way towards me right now....

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: Forgive people for what they've done to you. The best thing about forgiveness is that it not only detaches negative energy but it takes away their power over you. The sooner we forgive, the sooner we move on to a better more positive life..

author: Syed Wajid Hussain Jan
text: We need to strengthen such inner values as contentment, patience and tolerance, as well as compassion for others. Keeping in mind that it is expressions of affection rather than money and power that attract real friends, compassion is the key to ensuring our own well-being..
